sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均有"压迫，镇压"之意。
means: oppress ： 指用武力或权力等压迫、压制别人。
suppress ： 通常指通过强力，迅速有力地制止某事，或用意志控制自己的感情。

sentence.Network_en: Patsy had to clench her jaw to suppress her anger.
sentence.Network_cn: 帕奇只得咬紧牙关压住怒气。

sentence.Network_en: He was prepared to suppress rebellion by shooting down protesters.
sentence.Network_cn: 他准备开枪射击抗议者以镇压叛乱。

sentence.Network_en: He continued to suppress the people and serve the imperialists.
sentence.Network_cn: 他继续镇压人民,为帝国主义效劳.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... support 支持 suppress 镇压，压制 suppose 猜想，推测.
大学课程英文翻译 ... suppress 不输出抑制 Suppress 收缩抑制 surface 曲面表面, 曲面.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... support 支持 suppress 镇压，压制 suppose 猜想，推测.
《综合英语二》整理资料[旺旺英语论坛] ... ridicule 嘲弄 suppress 禁止披露，隐瞒 perspective （观察问题的）视角.

list.abs: 4) 压抑（Suppression）：是指个体将不能接受或具有威胁性的、痛苦的经验和冲动主动忘掉，或排除在记忆之外，从而免受动机冲突 …
...吞咽，继续取食。通常把影响昆虫取食第一步的物质及避免交配、产卵和栖息的物质统称为忌避剂。有人建议用“抑制剂”（suppressant） 一词来表达影响昆虫取食第二步的物质，用“摄止剂”（deterrent）一词来表达阻止进一步取食的物.
心理学专业词汇英语翻译(S) ... suppression ratio 抑制率 suppressive 抑制的 suppressor 抑制者.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(S6) - 商务英语词汇 ... suppositive 想象的 suppresser 镇压者 supramundane 远离俗世的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin suppress- 'pressed down', from the verb supprimere, from sub- 'down' + premere 'to press'

entry.def: If someone in authority suppresses an activity, they prevent it from continuing, by using force or making it illegal.

example.ex: ...drug traffickers, who continue to flourish despite international attempts to suppress them...
example.tran: 在国际社会强力打击下活动依然猖獗的贩毒分子

example.ex: ...nationwide demonstrations for democracy, suppressed after 7 weeks by the army.
example.tran: 在进行7周后遭到军队镇压的全国性民主示威活动

entry.tran: 制止，阻止，抑制(身体的功能或反应)
entry.def: If a natural function or reaction of your body is suppressed, it is stopped, for example by drugs or illness.

example.ex: The reproduction and growth of the cancerous cells can be suppressed by bombarding them with radiation.
example.tran: 可以通过放疗杀死癌细胞来抑制其再生和扩散。

example.ex: ...the strongest evidence so far that ultraviolet light can suppress human immune responses.
example.tran: 迄今为止可证明紫外线能抑制人体免疫反应的最有力证据

entry.tran: 抑制，控制，克制(感情或反应);忍住
entry.def: If you suppress your feelings or reactions, you do not express them, even though you might want to.

example.ex: Liz thought of Barry and suppressed a smile...
example.tran: 莉兹想起了巴里，忍住没笑。

example.ex: The Professor said that deep sleep allowed suppressed anxieties to surface.
example.tran: 教授说深度睡眠可以使压抑的焦虑情绪得以释放。

entry.def: If someone suppresses a piece of information, they prevent other people from learning it.

example.ex: At no time did they try to persuade me to suppress the information...
example.tran: 他们从没有试图劝我隐瞒这个消息。

example.ex: The wrong criminal is in the dock either because a genuine mistake has been made or because evidence has been suppressed.
example.tran: 冤案错案的出现，要么是因为确实弄错了，要么是因为证据被隐瞒。

entry.tran: 压制，抑制，阻止(进程或活动)
entry.def: If someone or something suppresses a process or activity, they stop it continuing or developing.

example.ex: 'The Government is suppressing inflation by devastating the economy,' he said...
example.tran: 他说，“政府正在通过破坏经济来抑制通货膨胀。”

example.ex: Lawyers said today's ruling would lead to higher prices and would suppress innovation of new products.
example.tran: 律师们称今天的裁决将会抬升价格，并抑制新产品的创新。

means.word_mean: 1. to put down by force or authority;
2. come down on or keep down by unjust use of one's authority;
3. control and refrain from showing; of emotions
4. keep under control; keep in check;

auth_sentence.content: We are purple with trying to suppress our giggles.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are purple with trying to suppress our giggles.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We are purple with trying to suppress our giggles.

auth_sentence.content: Ceramic needles can suppress any tumors and large metastases.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ceramic needles can suppress any tumors and large metastases.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ceramic needles can suppress any tumors and large metastases.

auth_sentence.content: It's fundamentally ignorant to censor and suppress art.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's fundamentally ignorant to censor and suppress art.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's fundamentally ignorant to censor and suppress art.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可压缩的, 可压榨的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compress[v.压缩]+ible能……的→adj.可压缩的, 可压榨的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 沮丧的,抑郁的;不景气的,萧条的
stems_affixes.word_buile: depress[v.压制,压抑]+ed……的→adj.沮丧的,抑郁的;不景气的,萧条的
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给人深刻印象的,感人的
stems_affixes.word_buile: impress印象,引人注目+ive……的→adj.给人深刻印象的,感人的
press挤压+ing……的→adj.急迫的
compress[v.压缩]+ion表名词→n.压缩,压紧,浓缩
depress[v.压制,压抑]+ion表名词→n.消沉;不景气萧条期
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达

stems_affixes.value_cn: 表达;表情;声调;腔调;榨出;措词;式;符号
stems_affixes.word_buile: express表达,表示+ion→n.表达;表情;声调;腔调;榨出;措词;式;符号
impress印象,引人注目+ion表名词→n.印象,感想;盖印,压痕
oppress[v.压迫,压制]+ion表名词→n.压迫

stems_affixes.value_cn: 压,压力,压迫,强制,紧迫,困苦,困难
stems_affixes.word_buile: press挤压+ure表名词→n.压,压力,压迫,强制,紧迫,困苦,困难
suppress[v.镇压,压制]+ion表名词→n.镇压,压制
press挤压→n.&n.&v.压, 按
com一起+press压→一起压→压缩
de向下+press压→向下压→压制→情绪低下
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达
im进+press挤压→压进去→盖印→印入头脑→留下印象
op加强动作+press挤压→拼命压→压迫
re回+press挤压→压回去
sup下+press压→压下去

stems_affixes.type_exp: 等在同辅音词根前表示"在下面;随后"

stems_affixes.word_buile: sup在下面;随后+plic重叠+ant……的→双膝重叠跪下→哀求的
sup在下面;随后+plant种植→种在下面,把上面的取代
sup在下面;随后+plic重叠+ate表动词→[膝盖]重叠跪下→恳求
sup在下面;随后+port运,带→带来支持
sup在下面;随后+pose放→放下去想→猜想
sup在下面;随后+press压→压下去

Sentence.sentence: It seems that men with traditional views of masculinity are more likely to suppress outward emotions and to fear emotions, supposedly because such feelings may lead to a loss of composure (镇定).
According to the author, men who suppress their emotions may develop stress-related disorders
First, suppressed emotions can contribute to stress-related disorders.

means.word_mean: 政府、统治者等 镇压；（武力）平定；压制

sentences.en: The new government quickly suppressed the rebellion.
sentences.cn: 新政府迅速把叛乱镇压下去。

means.word_mean: 禁止发表, 查禁; 隐瞒

sentences.en: They suppressed news that was not favourable to them.
sentences.cn: 对他们不利的新闻他们就扣留下来。

sentences.en: Even the grave young woman could not suppress a smile.
sentences.cn: 连那个严肃的年轻妇女都禁不住笑了。

sentences.en: She was struggling to suppress her sobs.
sentences.cn: 她拼命不让自己哭出来。

jushi.english: Even the grave young woman could not suppress a smile.
jushi.chinese: 连那个严肃的年轻妇女都禁不住笑了。

jushi.english: They suppressed news that was not favourable to them.
jushi.chinese: 对他们不利的新闻他们就扣留下来。
